website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and stability make this a great brace to get rid of nighttime pain and numbness.
pros: Cushioning in the palm of the hand offers soft stability
Can be used on either hand
cons: Velcro frays after a few months of consistent use

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: My right hand falls asleep about 15 times each night, waking me up each time. Some nights are worse than others, and it depends what I did the day before how severe it is. I know I have carpel tunnel but I doubt I will ever have surgery for it. This splint is AMAZING!!! It is SUPER comfortable and easy to put on and take off. And it keeps my wrist in a neutral position where my wrist is neither flexed nor extended, therefore, allowing me to sleep throughout the night without my hand falling asleep. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa CoreyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: THIS ITEM IS NOT RETURNABLE, and will be small for average to larger wrists.
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM IS NOT RETURNABLE, but you won't be told that on this site or during ordering. It's not really one-size. If you have average to large hands and wrists, this may be VERY tight. The problem is the elastic panel inside the "tube" which is much tighter than the velcro straps you see on the outside. For me (male), the velcro adjustments were useless since the panel was already too tight around my hand, wrist and forearm. They're very comfortable IF they fit you. If they're tight, you'll have pain wearing them. They should have two sizes of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Cured my pregnancy carpel tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with the carpel tunnel issues I have recently been having. I have never had carpel tunnel until this pregnancy and was not able to sleep through the night it was so painful. this wrist guard has eliminated the issue. I ordered a second one so i can wear one on each arm. it is very comfortable, it is soft but also supportive with the combination of the metal brace, and the foam beads. It keeps your wrist at a comfortable angle through the night. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vpier

customer_reviews.title: No returns for this item, even though it’s “Prime”, buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a “prime” product which should be returnable if item doesn’t match description, but it turns out that it is “not returnable”, making this a costly mistake in trusting an item description that was misleading. This wrap is enormous and far too flexible to actually keep wrist from bending in one’s sleep. The photos show a brace with a “pad” under the palm of your hand which would presumably help product fit more snugly, but doesn’t do so. It wasn’t used and should be returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Mom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help me with pain well or numbness. Also, not my style for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to help me. I didn’t like the feel/comfort either. Other guards take the pain away quickly and I have relief very soon! With this one, I still have pain for a bit and after pain is gone I have numbness. There was no return option for this item so even after trying it on and not liking, I couldn’t do anything so that’s when I tried it and found it didn’t help me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they once were
customer_reviews.text: They keep "updating" the design. The first one was great: comfortable, firm, and breathable. The one from 18 months ago was tighter, and more neoprene feeling than cloth like the old ones. Now the latest one's the same, but with a tighter weave so it feels a little less cool and comfortable than the second one, which was quite a bit less so than the old one from 2013 or so. All in all these are still the best of the night sleep supports, but their getting worse. If they "improve" it again, I'll switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Burns with God’s Light

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly quick relief!
customer_reviews.text: I've been experiencing menopause-related wrist pain -- especially at night. I didn't realize how much it was affecting my sleep until I got this brace. For the first time in a while, I've felt "well-rested" when I get up in the morning, and the persistent morning ache in my wrist has diminished in just a few days. I didn't expect such quick relief! I still feel a twinge at times during the day, but this brace has made such a difference. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Strong

customer_reviews.title: very bulky and intrusive
customer_reviews.text: The palm area was so comfortable when I tried it on I thought this was going to finally replace my old splints which I have sewn together several times in an attempt to extend their life. This splint is extensive as in photo and it fits just like in the photo so it is as described, however when actually trying to sleep it is heavy, itchy, it wakes me up as it really becomes a club. The palm "pillow" fits me exactly but the top somehow interferes with the base of my fingers. I do wear it occasionally in the day when I need to rest my hand.so it os not a fail, just not good for overnight relief.
customer_reviews.author: marthanyc

customer_reviews.title: rough item and customer service disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Today, I opened the package and tried it on. I found that there were a lot of threads and lines in the seams, and the mechanical workshop was doing very rough and I didn’t feel like genuine. i am a bit disappointing for product and customer service replied to me, if i want to return , they will have a regulation that 20% restocking fee will be applied to returns from purchases. it is not my mistake why do i pay 20% more or get back 80% at most. for example: not make wrong order, disorganization and so on. i need it but not return on purpose to stir mess up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL - 0 Stars if I could - Not Returnable!
customer_reviews.text: As many have pointed out this product is ridiculously too small. My wrist measured at 8 inches in diameter below the 9 inch maximum. Wearing these for an hour made my wrist and forearm hurt. I couldn't imagine how bad it would be sleeping in them. They should allow returns, now I'm stuck with 2 of these that dont fit and am out 45 bucks. Have an email in with Amazon, hopefully they will make it right as it's an Amazon prime item, it's supposed to follow the baseline Amazon.com 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Too small, too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was too small even though I had measurements taken. Way too tight even without the straps. Bummer I did not read the “no return” policy, that’s on me.
customer_reviews.author: Honch

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty dang good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and another brand to compare and see which i liked better. This one won! I wear these at night to relieve numbness, tingling and pain in my arms and hands when i wake up. This is made of what feels like a nice neoprene material and unlike the other one, the foam beads have stayed secure and maintained a nice pouch shape and I haven't had any issues with the support exposing itself. If there was any complaint it would be my hand /wrist does get warm throughout the night sometimes, but i can deal with that to be comfortable and less pain in the morning. Don't be afraid to give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I am an illustrator for a living, and cannot afford to have wrist pain. This night brace has really been a game changer for me. I have been practicing back stretches, Epsom salts, and using daytime braces, but still had wrist pain and occasional numbness. The night brace is comfortable enough to sleep in and REALLY helps. It’s not a miracle cure-all, but it is the best solution I have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeenjean

customer_reviews.title: SMALL.  Not Returnable.
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM IS NOT RETURNABLE. Fits small wrists & hands. Another buyer already described the problem perfectly (Ivy on September 25, 2017) I had to squeeze my average sized hand/wrist into the inside "tube" placement. Who needs velcro? If you attached the velcro any other way other than completely closed and snug, it would be like putting a size 38 belt over a size 30 waist jeans. Great, the belt allows for a larger waist but my pants are killing me! The description should be changed to "fits smaller wrists" and offering a larger size would be nice, because it probably would work if it fit. s
customer_reviews.author: lu

customer_reviews.title: Little bead pillow very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Firm support but soft pillow for the palm of your hand. Had trouble wearing a brace I bought at Walmart. The metal pressed against my palm and caused more pain while keeping my wrist from bending. THIS brace is comfortable because of the little bead filled pillow. The hard part of the brace is NOT pressing on your palm. Great product. Been using every night for over a month and really love it. If the brace you have now has a hard part touching your palm when you wear it and causing more pain then PLEASE ORDER THIS BRACE. GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Don't allow for natural, gentle, slight curve of your fingers
customer_reviews.text: These splints made my hands feel very stiff in the morning. They don't allow for a gentle, natural curve of my fingers. I've been using Walgreen's night support every night on both hands for 2 years. They work great and my hands feel great in the morning. However, I've only seen these supports in the Walgreen's store.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have pregnancy induced CTS and this product does not work. I tried sleeping with them on for one night and my finger tips didn't tingle the next morning so I thought I'd found the solution. As soon as I took them off, I realized I couldn't bend my fingers and then all the fluid rushed to my finger tips so it was like I hadn't worn them at all.
customer_reviews.author: journalistj

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and does not get hot
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda surprised that this thing really worked! I do heavy computer work and do not have carpal tunnel but I keep falling asleep on my wrist and it falls asleep. It was actually waking me up. It is comfortable and does not get hot. I was able to remedy my dead hand by putting a pillow between myself and the end of the bed ( I sleep on the edge.) Every now and then, I still need it so I keep it handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill O

customer_reviews.title: great for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: well made with nice padding that provides just enough support for sleeping to keep your wrist from bending, to prevent carpal tunnel symptoms. there's nothing hard to irritate hand or fingers. I have a problem with my left thumb CMC joint, which I occasionally notice rubbing on the base of where the thumb comes out of the support, but if you don't have that problem (which can cause swelling and pain) at base of thumb, the support is super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: For mild cases, only modest support
customer_reviews.text: I originally liked these and purchased one for each wrist for carpal tunnel. They are pretty comfortable but the support is only medium and I started having symptoms so I switched to the Mueller short brace for the bad side and I like it a lot better. Gives a lot more support, it’s not uncomfortable at night. There is some padding on these that fits in your palm in place and a soft wrist support, and the padding started moving around. I bought the Mueller for the other side too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C.

customer_reviews.title: This wrist support is great, but basically for sleeping only.  Just what the doctor ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I was having a real carpal tunnel thing going on (still do, doc says it should go away in about 6 months!!!), this wrist support is great. It is basically only for sleeping (or watching TV) because you can't use your hand (get another glove type brace for semi-activity), but you will sleep with this every night. It is my best friend these days. Near total immobilization for 8 hours a day (while sleeping) was excellent treatment. If you even think you need something like this, this product is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrist injury, strain.
customer_reviews.text: I fell and injured my wrist, knew a doctors visit would give the same option as buying wrist support. I wore it for about a week each night and feel it really helped me heal faster. As a tattooer I was really nervous about pain at work and after the first night I felt stronger at work when I couldn't use a wrist support. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice support, but it will cut you.
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro tabs have sharp edges and will cut you while sleeping. Saving a little money by not sewing the Velcro tabs to the strap material makes this a big miss.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurous

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This makes my painful hand and wrist very comfortable. I have had it well over a year but need to order a new one because the padding Os getting flat and the bar is starting to gig in. It is unfortunate that they don’t offer the option to buy just a new pad. I bought a second one and it is not eligible for return. It has a tear. I guess the only way around is to buy a new one at the store and swap out. So wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A Burica

customer_reviews.title: Started feeling signs of carpal tunnel, this helps relive the pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after seeing it for much more in the local drug stores. It is easy to put on and has a nice little bean bag pad for your palm. It takes some getting used to, and you go to bed feeling like you are about to enter a boxing match (I am thinking about getting another for the other hand as well) It doesn't have to be really tight to provide relief.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schaule

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: After I woke up in the middle of the night because of pain, I do a research and I found that I have a wrist problem. The doctor recommended that I should wear wrist support before sleep but I don’t wanna use the one that for sport neither the one that have metal rack inside. So I found this one it’s very comfy but you have to tighten it enough to not lose it when you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Yosa

customer_reviews.title: night support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a suggestion from a fellow racquetball player who said his tennis elbow was alleviated when he slept with a wrist brace at night. Maybe it has something to do with keeping your hand from making a fist or bending in the middle of the night, but it does seem to help. It hasn't got rid of it, but it does seem to not bother me as much in the days after playing. I usually wear it for 3-4 days after playing. It's worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: gary assassin

customer_reviews.title: Let's me sleep through the night without pain
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal tunnel syndrome (or it may be medial epicondylitis- Golfer's Elbow). Without this wrist support, I wouldn't be able to sleep through the night because of pain. Comfortable and lightweight. I've been using it to sleep pain free every night for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Flash2520

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the arthritis in my thumbs
customer_reviews.text: I curl my wrists at night which causes strain on the joints and mild arthritis symptoms. Wearing these braces at night prevents that and considerably lessens my pain when I wake up in the mornings. They have held up to nightly wear for a couple years now and still are very comfortable, though they can get a little warm sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Grimrivet

customer_reviews.title: It helps my hands feel better in the morning.
customer_reviews.text: I have very small wrists and it fits me perfectly. I woke up for the first time without any pain in my hand. I switched it to the other hand for the next night and that hand felt fabulous the next morning, but the one I didn’t wear it on was screaming at me. So, now that I know it works, I’m buying another one for my other hand.
customer_reviews.author: Me me

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfy and does a fabulous job of preventing the pain and numbness I usually have at night. Definitely too bulky for daytime wear, I tried, I felt like I had walrus flippers instead of hands with functional fingers, dropping stuff over and over...trying to pick up tiny things with my giant, awkward flipper hands like, oh man, can you pick that up for me, my hands are retarded today...anyhoo...yes, excellent for night wear.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, especially for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable brace I've found for sleeping. I have a horrible time wearing them at night as I ALWAYS scratch my husband with the Velcro, this one is soft with minimal Velcro that attaches at a convenient spot so I typically don't scratch myself or him. I recommend this brace for anyone who's been advised to sleep with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: The cheapest & most effective way I have found give my wrists a good night's rest.
customer_reviews.text: If you have carpal tunnel or any type of repetitive motion or wrist injury this is so helpful. Was recommended by my Dr. Cheaper to buy here on Amazon then through insurance. From Computer work, my wrists were a mess. I wear these when I sleep which puts your wrists in a neutral position. It also gives you cushioned support. & I wake up with zero pain. Works for me. Only downside, in summer they are hot.
customer_reviews.author: hecklerpix

customer_reviews.title: Best Brace!!! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for wrist braces because I’m recovering from a broken right wrist. Everyone of them were too small even the ones marked large/extra large. This blue brace is awesome! It is just to your size by the way the Velcro closes!!! I’m so happy I ordered this brace and didn’t give up after all the other ones didn’t work. If you want comfort, support and even looks good too because it’s blue....this is the one to buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: amazing brace and good for wrist tendonitis!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my SO and it saved her career. Artists work very hard and will push themselves too hard by overworking sometimes and this brace is phenomenal for recovering during the night and sometimes during the day. It's very comfortable and keeps your wrist in a good position, you can't even accidentally sleep on your wrist anymore. It definitely helps those with tendonitis or those recovering from it and I'll probably buy another for myself since I do a lot of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Flare

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver, comfy and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I kept waking up with my hands asleep. So I started sleeping with this. It's made all the different in the world. I think I clench my hands when it's cold (even though I wear gloves in bed) and after using the computer for over 30 years, well, my hands need some help. It's just great! I have other wrist supports, but this is the best! Way cool!
customer_reviews.author: TrixieTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: My fingers going numb in the middle of the night began waking me up each night. It took 1-2 weeks to fully get comfortable sleeping with these because I start off sleep with my arms and hands under my pillow, and they are bulky compared to nothing. I used them for 2 years at home, in hotels and on airplanes. I washed in sink and put in dryer the last time which I don't think is recommended but didn't hurt them. I recently ordered a 2nd pair as the fill beading gradually wears down and becomes less padded. Worth it to sleep through the night.
customer_reviews.author: DAN LOWREY

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a cake decorator for 30 years. I believe I have carpel tunnel in both wrists. My hands go numb and pins and needles feeling especially at night. I have tried several braces. I decided to try this product because of the reviews. What a difference! I got relief the first night! It is so soft and comfortable. I hate to take them off in the a.m. it keeps my hands straight while I sleep. Money well spent. I highly recommend these for someone with a similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Night Brace!
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and carpal tunnel. This is the 2nd pair purchase of these braces. I to temporary moving and the packers had packed my other pair of these night braces and moved them to storage. I had to get a replacement for them to help prevent my fingers from becoming contorted and my wrists from curving in during the middle of the night causing great pain. I'm glad that Amazon was able to offer it for substantially less than my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great find for restful sleep ....Zzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: I wear wrist splints every day...and sometimes just some arthritic gloves! I Have had mine for over a year! It is like sticking your arm in a stuffed animal! Great find for us with severe wrist pain and numbness! I need a full body size for all my aches and numbness from OA! LOL I have very small hands and works great for either hand! I am back to buy another! Now I will have one for each hand! Perfect for bedtime! Sweet Dreamzzzz!!!
customer_reviews.author: Myboo

customer_reviews.title: WARNING-not fully adjustable and not returnable
customer_reviews.text: This item has an inner elastic sleeve that is quite narrow even for an average hand/wrist. I was very disappointed that amazon doesn't allow you to return this item for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Goldfarb

customer_reviews.title: Solved all the problems
customer_reviews.text: I bough these for my husband after doing some research about his hands going numb at night!! These gloves FIXED the problem!!! BOOM!!! Just fixed it, they are perfect. He is sleeping through the night and no longer wakes up with numb hands. He is happier, more rested and nicer... lol!! What a simple fix that made a big impact
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Total game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 trips to the doctor, 2 rounds of cortisone, and some uncomfortable splints that they gave me at the doctor's office, I found this brace at a store initially. I was still in tremendous pain from postpartum carpal tunnel and was desperate to try anything. It worked so well that I bought another one here on Amazon. Highly recommend this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Allison A Phears

customer_reviews.title: Good, but bulky & a bit cumbersome to get on & off
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal tunnel and am trying these out for nighttime. They are functional and relatively comfortable, but very bulky. Makes it challenging with taking a sip of water once in bed, and have to take off to go to the bathroom each time. Getting them on & off is a job in itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best! I've purchased several different types in the past and aside from falling apart after a short time they were extremely uncomfortable. I use these at night to sleep and don't even feel them. And above EVERYTHING else, THEY WORK!!!! I no longer wake up at night with pain.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Super soft for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't get tight enough at the wrist. You can easily slip it off if needing to use the restroom in the middle of the night. BUT>>>It is comfortable to sleep with. i don't know if it is actually helping my carpal tunnel because my fingers still tingle when wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I don't have huge hands and these are too tight. Cutting off circulation mitigates any effects they might have to relieve carpal tunnel. Also the fact that I can't return them is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Green

customer_reviews.title: Fit too small. Not really 'one size fits all'. CANNOT RETURN IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this item is not 'eligible for return' (???!!) The fit is really small. It was purchased for a woman with relatively small hands but the brace is way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: RUS

customer_reviews.title: One size fits "many"
customer_reviews.text: I think this brace is perfect for those with ct that need extra support while sleeping to prevent morning pain. The problem is with the fitment. I have average to thin arms. Even so, the depression marks from this brace are uncomfortable for the first few minutes after it is removed. There needs to be a m/f model. Make sure you buy it from a retailer that accepts returns just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Bongo

customer_reviews.title: Non-returnable!
customer_reviews.text: This brace is way too large and it is blue, rather than Black that it shows in the photo for the item. When I went to return it, it will not allow me to and no where on the ad did it say "non-returnable". Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsinite

customer_reviews.title: Night time carpel tunnel support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, soft material. After reading other reviews, I don't move the closer, just keep it in one spot and slip the wrist support on. Works fine, best wrist support that Have used.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Franco

customer_reviews.title: Good for the short term, velcro curls out
customer_reviews.text: The velcro has a tendency to curl out and lose its grip after a few months, but if you only need it for a short term injury recovery, I'd say it's alright. Its comfortable, but a bit tedious to put on. If you need something that's longer lasting, say for carpel tunnel syndrome issues, I'd go with the Mueller Nighttime brace. I did.
customer_reviews.author: Rob L. Newbrough

customer_reviews.title: This product was perfect. Its soft and after a while you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Went to the Dr and she said I had the beginning stages of carpal tunnel. She said I needed support while sleeping. This product was perfect. Its soft and after a while you don't even notice that you have it on. After a couple of weeks of wearing it, my symptoms were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Oralia R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and stability
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort and fit. It's taking awhile for my Carpal Tunnel Syndrome from an accident to get better. It does a great job stopping the movement of my hand when i am sleeping to keep it rested. I would recommend this support for everyone. Don Barajas : - )
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Barajas Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This works well for sleeping. it's not overly tight and doesn't completely immobilize your wrist, but it restricts the range of movement without creating pressure points or discomfort. So far so good. I am starting to wonder how long it'll be before the velcro starts fraying the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Y. in Texas

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product even for those without carpal tunnel but ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for each wrist to alleviate discomfort from carpal tunnel syndrome. I sleep with them every night comfortablly and find I miss them when I don't. I would recommend this product even for those without carpal tunnel but who do a lot of keyboarding simply because I've found the natural arch the padding gives to the hand does actually feels relaxing to the muscles.
customer_reviews.author: MzWeet

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, easy to sleep with all night long
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to sleep with all night long. Because of the way I used to bend my wrist when sleeping I used to wake up with pain and numbness. All that is gone, I can seep all night. Constructed well. I am considering buying another to keep as backup.
customer_reviews.author: Mokopuku

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help stabilize my primary knuckle joint on my index finger. I like that the bottom side of the splint comes up over the palm, providing support to the hand as well as the wrist. It's very comfortable, and it works without me having to have it super-tight. It hasn't disrupted my sleep at all. I'm a little concerned that it may be too warm in the summer months, but we'll cross that bridge when it comes.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Throop

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.  Helps with pain while asleep.
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous wrist support from hand specialist that was scratchy and uncomfortable. I tried one of these and it was so comfortable at night that I bought another one for my other wrist. My husband was happy when I got this one, he said it didn't scratch him either. (I was unaware that it bothered him LOL) I like that it can be used for either hand as well. I recommended this wrist support to a friend and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Weinert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable night brace that really helps with Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped with my Carpal Tunnel Syndrome! It is very comfortable and I wake up without symptoms. The soft pad which protects hand against curling or clenching is great for night time use. I have only had it a week so I don't know how well the Velcro tabs hold up. I have not worn it in terribly hot weather so I am not sure if it will be comfortable in summer. But so far I am very impressed by the design!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Help w/Carpal Pain
customer_reviews.text: I encounter occasional carpal flare ups, that are nearly excruciating. This brace is near magic. Super duper comfortable, works on either wrist. I'll go to sleep with it on, and if the flare up hasn't completely subsided by the time I wake, it's typically lessened to only a fraction of the pain. For the price, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mail Debaser

customer_reviews.title: Bean bags hurt
customer_reviews.text: I've tried three different types of wrist braces for my carpal tunnel and this one makes my fingers hurt sooooo much. I think it's the bean bags in the palms which are supposed to provide comfort since my other two pairs don't have them. The tops of these braces also come up quite high and that irritates my fingers too. The braces are very sturdy and great quality. But after a night of sleep my fingers hurt wildly, much more so than they do with other braces I've tried. I wish there was some way to detach or adjust the bean bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dutcher

customer_reviews.title: Description of item not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The images of the product are different than the product I received and you are stuck with it because when you try to return the item it is non-refundable. Yet on the side of the item I received it CLEARLY states. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED, If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you may return for a replacement or a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my wrist's RSI
customer_reviews.text: I a very frequent computer user and have an repetitive stress injury in my mouse using (right) wrist. My doctor informed me that wearing a guard like this Futuro one is often more effective than wearing one during the day. So i purchased this because it was very reasonable compared to the price at the pharmacy or at the doctor's office. I have noticed a positive difference in the pain/feeling in my wrist cased by frequent computer/phone usage. I recommend you give this a try prior to considering invasive options to your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: DavidHowie

customer_reviews.title: Support fits well and is adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor suggested I try this unit to see if i had Carpel Tunnel damage. The brace fits properly and after a few weeks of use I don't think I have carpel tunnel. It hurts just the same now and it did when I started. I have a large hand and wrist ant it fits properly. It is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: BDM

customer_reviews.title: but it works GREAT for that
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with this on my left hand every night. The only reason I subtracted a star is that the palm side is very high on the hand, which means you can't really use your hand to pick anything up. This is ONLY for sleeping, but it works GREAT for that.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: GET A GRIP
customer_reviews.text: I love this brace! Since I started wearing it, my sleep has improved tremendously. I no longer wake up in the middle of the night with my hand and all five fingers numb. Def an excellent and wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gaughan

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me !
customer_reviews.text: Had some minor carpal tunnel syndrome. (Hope I spelled that right.) The one the MD recommended cost way to much, even though he wrote it as a scrip that my insurance would mostly cover. Researched the subject and bought this one with my fingers crossed. It took a while but not really all that long. At some later date I had a similar problem with my other wrist. A few weeks took care of that side as well. Is still in good shape. Hope to never again need it but it worked well and it is now in the closet where rarely used medical supplies repose. It worked ! Even worked well ! And the price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Russell Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection for pisiform bone on heel of hand
customer_reviews.text: Great splint and quality product that protects my pisiform bone (where heel of hand meets wrist), which hurts due to repetitive pressure on hard surfaces. The metal splint on the underside completely removes all pressure from the pisiform. Unfortunately, it's just too hard to type with this, so I'm sticking with the IMAK Smart Gloves for computer duty.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee InfusionTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description runs small not comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to sleep in at all!!! It says one size fits all and I have small hands and it is tight on my wrists , but can’t return it because it doesn’t except returns waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Improved  my carpel tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: I interned at a hospital over the summer. Lots of daily typing, started getting carpel tunnel syndrome and sleeping in awkward wrist positions. Slept with these for a couple months every night and they adjusted my wrist sleeping positions and got rid of my wrist pain. I’ve discontinued using them now but they look sturdy if I ever need them again!
customer_reviews.author: Romey Youniss

customer_reviews.title: Great solution at night
customer_reviews.text: I think I like it: for what is worth I've been living in pain for almost a year after my pregnancy (they told me I had "mom's thumb") and got a shot before but nothing really worked because they pain came back and it's slightly there. So I got recommend to use this just at night. And I think after 3 weeks more less I've been feeling better of my wrist., #yas!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: purchased two sets!
customer_reviews.text: I was starting to get symptoms of carpal tunnel from the way that my hands/wrists are positioned when I sleep. My doctor recommended that I sleep with wrist braces. I purchased two of these wrist supports and I LOVE them! They're comfortable, adjustable, and prevent me from sleeping on my hands weirdly. My husband has a similar problem so he used my wrist supports for a couple of nights to see how he liked them and he made me order two more for him. We both use ours most nights!
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps pain
customer_reviews.text: I will ocassionally wake up with pain in my hand or wrist, and at some point it would never go away. So I bought this brace and wore it to bed every night for two weeks. The pain went away. It sometimes comes back, so I will start wearing this again, and it always helps. I like the fact that it is designed to be worn on either arm.
customer_reviews.author: MadCat

customer_reviews.title: Firm yet comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mail carrier and my doctor suggested that I brace my wrists at night to help with wrist and hand pain. These have been amazing. They have a little pillow filled with what feels like silica beads that your palm cups perfectly. It took some getting used to but gives the right amount of support and really helps my body recover after work.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: One size does NOT fit all.
customer_reviews.text: My wrist measures 8" which is within the "one size fits all" range. However, this item is too small and fits too tightly. Then Amazon says I can't return it. I guess I'll try calling the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great brace, just needs some adjusting
customer_reviews.text: This brace helps me sleep through the night because it quells my carpel tunnel symptoms. And for what it's supposed to do, it does. The only issue I have with it is, the straps. They work, but you have to pull them rather tight to get them to latch correctly. So it squeezes your arm pretty tight. I've found myself wrestling with it in the middle of the night because it's too tight. If they would make the straps just a half an inch longer, it would be so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Sciortino

customer_reviews.title: Best then I ever imagined!
customer_reviews.text: Every night my fingers would go numb, feel needles poking me and pain would radiate in my wrist up my arm so bad I would wake for hours! From night one, NO MORE, STOPPED IMMEDIATELY, sometimes I put Bio Freeze on my wrist first then the brace! Now I need to find brace to wear daily for continuing support!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable and non returnable, way too small even for a small hand and wrist
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! And this is not eligible for return! It’s way too small and I have a small hand and wrist. It made my pain worse in just a short amount of time. I will be calling the 800 number enclosed to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Todd

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two in January as replacement for other identical two. Overall very satisfied, but on one the velcro strap at the top of the brace does not work anymore after only 7 months. Seriously?
customer_reviews.author: LI shopper

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these wasn't as warm as I thought it would be! Mild discomfort around the edges but I think that's because I need to lose weight and not because of the product's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Don’t try this one!
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday and it made my hand feel a lot worse. Try a different one. Because they didn’t even guarantee enough for me to return it. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Unsastisfied

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and sturdy. My wrist was supported all night long. I read a post to Velcro it once to the right size and to just slip it on and off so the Velcro lasts longer. I've been using it for about a year and it's still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Brace
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brace because I have a trigger finger and Quite a bit of pain at night. This brace completely stabilizers my hand and my finger doesn't slap down at night while I'm sleeping. The padding in the palm of the brace helps my hand relax at night. It has been great
customer_reviews.author: chattycathy

customer_reviews.title: Good outcome, flawed design
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro is attached using stuff plastic that ultimately gets exposed. This has the potential to give you some nasty scratches! Beware of that, but otherwise does what is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: William Nathan Straub

customer_reviews.title: I love this, can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: This wrist support has been a godsend to me. I started having major pain in my left arm when sleeping. I found it was due to carpal tunnel, who knew! I picked one of these up and it has relieved the pain and numbness I had been experiencing at night while sleeping. I bought a second one to have as back up, I cannot sleep without it. It also saves my headboard by covering up my wedding rings so I don't scratch the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: 7 1/2 months pregnant and have the worst case of carpel tunnel! I had it before pregnancy and now it's so bad, hardly anything will help! I have tried it all and I have tried many wrist wraps! These were my 3rd pair to buy and they have been a answered prayer!! Best wraps by far I have used and let me sleep at night! I cannot be more grateful for these wraps!!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: I have carpel tunnel syndrome and I needed a wrist support, supposedly for sleeping. This support seemed to have all the needed adjustments. However, I found that it was not good for sleeping as it was too restrictive. I purchased a lesser support which has proven much better. I found that this Futuro support was much better suited for use during the day as it offers a good deal of support and prevents you from moving your wrist incorrectly. I do not recommend this for night wear but do recommend it for day wear but for a limited amount of time as it becomes uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item works great and does exactly what it says it does along ...
customer_reviews.text: What would I do without this!?! This item works great and does exactly what it says it does along with being very comfortable. I do massage therapy full time, so I enjoy the comfort of having my hands unclenched with the soft beads while I sleep. Whether or not one has developed anything specific in their hands- this is a great preventative tool for anyone who uses their hands all day. Since most people naturally curl their hands in their sleep this only makes sense. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this would really help, but it does! I actually wear it in conjuction with copper infused compression gloves that help with circulation. The combination helps me wake up with less pain and stiffness than when before I got them or if I skip a night (which I did, just to make sure it wasn't all in my head). That pillow thing makes these wonderful to sleep in - much better than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, and adds pressure to the carpal tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I found the neoprene to be too tight for my slightly larger-than-average hand and cut it off. However, I then noticed that the spoon and beanbag were adding pressure to the nerves in the arm and carpal tunnel. Keep looking, this thing isn't as good as the ratings suggest.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The padding inside supports your wrist/hand in a comfort lacking in other brands. Definitely need this at night. Some models dig into your skin. This one doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: I find them comfortable, and they pretty much eliminate my carpal tunnel ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many pairs of these for years, and they work really well. I find them comfortable, and they pretty much eliminate my carpal tunnel pain. They do wear out (the padding in the palm area gets flat), so expect to replace them about every 6 months. These fit right or left hands.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: It helps with the pain at night
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this support at night if you suffer from elbow tendinitis, and hand/wrist nerve pain. if I forget to wear at night, I will wake up in pain, thank god someone came up with this!
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Helped my carpal tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I had pain on going on my wrist and I used this night time. It is comfortable and perfectly fits my wrist. It prevented the carpal tunnel syndrome but you wake up with your wrist and hand a bit stiffer than usual
customer_reviews.author: Yavuz

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed. I have a ganglion cryst on my right wrist. I’ve had it for about 4yrs. If I stabilize my wrist for a few months it will go down and not be as painful. My main wrist brace is tight & uncomfortable while sleeping. & this brace is literally like a pillow wrapped around your hand.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyF

customer_reviews.title: but it is adjustable and would easily fit a man as well
customer_reviews.text: I had a much smaller wrist brace that did not go as far up my arm. Even with the small one, I was having problems with my hand falling asleep and the pain waking me up on occasion. This brace was exactly what I needed! I have small hands and arms, but it is adjustable and would easily fit a man as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this brace!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this brace! I have had carpal tunnel for 7 years, so I have gone through plenty of wrist braces. This is the most comfortable brace I've had. Before this brace, I would take my other braces off in my sleep because they were so uncomfortable. Since I've had this one, I haven't taken it off in my sleep at all.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: All it promises to be: highly adjustable, comfortable, and effective
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor specifically recommended a "night brace" and this one had the highest rating. It has three Velcro-type tabs for fitting to your wrist, and a "pillow" section that you can push around to support your wrist in just the right way. The fabric is comfortable and non-itchy. I haven't used it in the summer yet so I don't know just how breathable it is, though. It's also lightweight, especially for a brace with a stiff section for keeping your wrist unbent. And the most important part--it works very well. Once or twice after wearing it all night, I have woken up with some numbness and tingling in my fingers, but usually my wrist is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ej Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand and another one for my other arm (I’m a gamer and designer so carpal tunnel occurs in both arms), and this brand is far more comfortable and works much better. It’s less well known and cheaper than the other one but tons better. I love it and has helped me so much!
customer_reviews.author: Flavia

product_meta.title: Night Wrist Sleep Support, Moderate Stabilizing Support, Adjust to Fit
feature_bullets: Provides moderate support to injured wrists
Helps provide relief from symptoms associated with carpel tunnel syndrome
Plush, cushioning helps protect your wrist during sleep
Cushioning beads help promote a neutral hand position during sleep
Removable palmar splint for customizable support
Wear on either wrist for versatility
Supported by our expert panel of engineers and medical professionals

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
